alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northeastern Bay, east central Walton, southern Holmes and Washington Counties through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 558 PM EDT/458 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bonifay to 17 miles southeast of Vernon. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lynn Haven, Vernon, Bonifay, Chipley, Bradford, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Whitehead Crossroads, College Station, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Porter Lake, Brannonville, Knox Hill, Douglass Crossroad and Orange Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
